SELECT m.*, c.name as categoryName FROM music m LEFT JOIN category c ON m.category_id = c.id WHERE IFNULL(m.deleted,0) = 0
AND (m.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR m.artist LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR m.album LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
AND c.name = #{category}
ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
